description: This header file defines interfaces and constants for managing network devices traffic monitoring within a larger software component. It declares functions for setting and getting harvesting statuses, reporting periods, polling periods, default values, and validation routines related to network device traffic data collection.

methods.name: SetNDTHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Sets the harvesting status for network devices; returns 0 on success, 1 on failure.

methods.name: GetNDTHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the current harvesting status as a boolean value.

methods.name: SetNDTReportingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the reporting period for network device scans in seconds.

methods.name: GetNDTReportingPeriod
methods.description: Retrieves the current reporting period in seconds.

methods.name: SetNDTPollingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the polling period for network device scans in seconds.

methods.name: GetNDTPollingPeriod
methods.description: Retrieves the current polling period in seconds.

methods.name: GetNDTReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Gets the default reporting period value.

methods.name: SetNDTReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default reporting period value.

methods.name: GetNDTPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Gets the default polling period value.

methods.name: SetNDTPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default polling period value.

methods.name: GetNDTOverrideTTLDefault
methods.description: Gets the default timeout for accelerated scans.

methods.name: ValidateNDTPeriod
methods.description: Validates the provided period value to ensure it falls within an acceptable range.

methods.name: SetNDTOverrideTTL
methods.description: Sets the override TTL for network device scans.
